Docs.summary: Constructs and initializes a new instance of using the provided boxes and .
Docs.remarks: should not be created by the user. It is automatically generated by .

Docs.summary: Gets the date and time the file was created on.
Docs.value: A representing the date and time the audio-stream was created on.
Docs.remarks: If not set in the file, the value will be midnight on January 1, 1904.

Docs.summary: Gets the date and time the file was last modified.
Docs.value: A representing the date and time the audio-stream was last modified.
Docs.remarks: If not set in the file, the value will be midnight on January 1, 1904.

Docs.summary: Gets the playback rate scaling of the audio-stream.
Docs.remarks: This value should almost always be 1.00.

Docs.summary: Gets the volume scaling of the audio-stream.
Docs.remarks: This value should almost always be 1.00.

Docs.summary: This class is a subclass of containing additional members specific to MPEG-4 audio files.
